text:
A total of 343 cases were cleared and compensation to the tune of Rs.5.14 crore was given at the mega lok adalat held here on Saturday.

A total of 1,416 cases were taken by the adalat for hearing.

Mahila Court Judge Brinda Kesavachari presided over the meeting.

District Legal Services Authority Secretary K. Karunanidhi made all arrangements.

Additional district judge M. Sai Saravanan, CJM S. Jeganathan, Judges A. Deepa and A.K. Babulal and judicial magistrates M. Seyadhu Sulaiman Ussain, C.B. Vadagiri and K. Kavitha heard the cases.

Similar Lok Adalat was held at Palani also. Palani Sub-Court Judge A. Radhakrishnan, District Munsiff K.L. Priyanga and Judicial Magistrate N. Saravana Kumar cleared more than 60 cases in the temple town.
title: Mega lok adalat
